org.jsfml.audio

Class SoundBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.audio.SoundBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstSoundBuffer, Const

    public class SoundBuffer
extends SFMLNativeObject
implements ConstSoundBuffer
    Buffer of audio samples, providing an audio data source for a Sound.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundBuffer()
      Constructs a sound buffer.
      SoundBuffer(ConstSoundBuffer other)
      Constructs a sound buffer by copying another sound buffer.

      • loadFromSamples

        public void loadFromSamples(short[] samples,
                   int channelCount,
                   int sampleRate)
                     throws IOException
        Attempts to load the sound buffer from an array of raw 16-bit audio samples.
        Parameters:
        samples - the samples data.
        channelCount - the amount of audio channels.
        sampleRate - the sample rate in samples per second.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
